long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛡️ Scam Sniffer - Web3 Security Guardian

🌟 The all-in-one web3 security solution protecting you from scams and malicious activities through real-time detection and alerts. 
Our multi-layered protection includes:

🔒 First Layer Protection:
• Web3 Safe Browsing with real-time malicious website detection
• Blocklist database trusted by Binance, Rabby, Phantom, Bybit & more
• Coverage: EVM, Solana, Sui, Ripple, BTC, TON & TRON ecosystems

💫 Second Layer Protection:
• Real-time signature security checks
• NFT listing/offer verification
• Token approval monitoring
• Clear transaction simulation

🔐 Comprehensive Protection:
• X (Twitter) phishing alerts
• Social engineering prevention
• Frontend compromise protection
• Malware detection (fake apps, games, browsers)

✨ Key Features:
• Real-time threat detection
• User-friendly interface
• Multi-chain support
• Community-driven platform

🎯 Our Mission:
Enhance web3 security for everyone and accelerate mass adoption through community-powered protection

📱 Available Plans:
• Premium enabled by default (0.25% fee on selected DEX trades)
• Can switch to Free plan with limited detections

🤝 Join the safer web3 movement - Add Scam Sniffer to Chrome today!
